issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:

fields.summary: Failed to create snapshot while using any SAN

comments.body: [~shaon], please try to identify when this condition started happening. We believe snapshots were working on SANs middle of last week. Also, any information on file permissions may help. Thanks!
Ant isn't copying {{check-iscsi-target-name}}'s executable bit, because Java.  We have to add that bit separately after installing it.

Per suggestion from [~gholms], changing the perms of {{/usr/libexec/eucalyptus/check-iscsi-target-name}} on the SC to be executable resolved the issue. I believe he has identified the root cause and has a fix ready.

Fix Verified.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.4.0
Release     : 0.25744.123.20170119gitc31941b.el7

Snapshots working when using SAN. Tested delivered fix with equallogic. Tested the fix manually (see previous comment) with 3Par
{code}
[root@g-08-09 ~]# euca-version
euca2ools 3.4.0-5-g915fa50 (Newton)
eucalyptus 4.4.0

[root@g-08-09 ~]# euctl one.storage.blockstoragemanager
one.storage.blockstoragemanager = equallogic

[root@g-08-09 ~]# euca-describe-snapshots verbose
SNAPSHOT	snap-12e36112	vol-580be68c	completed	2017-01-20T01:02:55.742Z	100%	000238995438	3
SNAPSHOT	snap-5f27bc92	vol-4e46483d	completed	2017-01-20T01:13:32.563Z	100%	000238995438	1
SNAPSHOT	snap-c71681ce	vol-4e46483d	completed	2017-01-20T01:17:30.507Z	100%	000238995438	1	ebstest
SNAPSHOT	snap-96d80afe	vol-c0f6d11f	completed	2017-01-20T01:18:00.777Z	100%	000238995438	1	ebstest
SNAPSHOT	snap-67469b89	vol-f39a0b54	completed	2017-01-20T01:17:00.200Z	100%	000238995438	1	ebstest
{code}
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
